SEARCH
Package grafiosch.gtnet.handler

Class GTNetResponseResolver

java.lang.Object
grafiosch.gtnet.handler.GTNetResponseResolver
@Component public class GTNetResponseResolver extends Object
Evaluates GTNetMessageAnswer rules to determine automatic responses to incoming requests. Uses EvalEx expression engine to evaluate conditions defined in GTNetMessageAnswer entities. Conditions can reference variables such as:
  • Time variables: hour (0-23), dayOfWeek (1=Monday, 7=Sunday)
  • Request counters: dailyCount, dailyLimit
  • My server: MyDailyRequestLimit, MyTimezone
  • Remote server: RemoteDailyRequestLimit, RemoteTimezone, RemoteDomainRemoteName
  • Calculated: TimezoneOffsetHours (decimal hours difference remote - local)
  • Connection counts: TotalConnections, ConnectionsLastPrice, ConnectionsHistorical
  • Message: Message (free-text message content from the request)
  • Any parameter from the message payload
Rules are evaluated in priority order (lowest priority value first). The first matching condition determines the response. If no condition matches, the message awaits manual admin review.
See Also:
  • for the rule configuration entity

    • resolveAutoResponse

      public Optional<GTNetResponseResolver.ResolvedResponse> resolveAutoResponse(byte requestCodeValue, GTNet remoteGTNet, Map<String,GTNetMessage.GTNetMessageParam> params)
      Attempts to resolve an automatic response for the given request message code.
      Parameters:
      requestCodeValue - the incoming message code value
      remoteGTNet - the remote GTNet entity (may be null)
      params - message parameters
      Returns:
      resolved response if a rule matches, empty if manual handling required

    • resolveAutoResponse

      public Optional<GTNetResponseResolver.ResolvedResponse> resolveAutoResponse(byte requestCodeValue, GTNet remoteGTNet, Map<String,GTNetMessage.GTNetMessageParam> params, String message)

      Parameters:
      requestCodeValue - the incoming message code value
      remoteGTNet - the remote GTNet entity (may be null)
      params - message parameters
      message - free-text message content from the request (may be null)
      Returns:
      resolved response if a rule matches, empty if manual handling required

    • resolveAutoResponse

      public Optional<GTNetResponseResolver.ResolvedResponse> resolveAutoResponse(List<GTNetMessageAnswer> rules, GTNet remoteGTNet, Map<String,GTNetMessage.GTNetMessageParam> params)
      Resolves auto-response using pre-loaded rules from the context.
      Parameters:
      rules - the list of GTNetMessageAnswer rules ordered by priority (may be null or empty)
      remoteGTNet - the remote GTNet entity
      params - message parameters
      Returns:
      resolved response if a rule matches, empty otherwise
